actions.text: Committee on Commerce ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Commerce. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Packwood. With written report No. 97-63.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 89.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972, as amended, to extend the authorization of appropriations for fiscal years 1982 and 1983.

summary.text: Amends the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982 and 1983 for the Departments of Commerce and Interior for: (1) marine mammal research grants; (2) marine mammal conservation and protection; and (3) the Marine Mammal Commission.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972, as amended, to extend the authorization of appropriations for fiscal years 1982 and 1983.
